attributes.action: dump the expenses and stop using our taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All these MP's are greedy using our hard earned taxes to pay for their gardening, TV’s, clothes, toilet rolls, mortgages that are already paid, etc. I could go on. How dare they, we are here struggling and have to pay our own bills and everything else ourselves but they can use our money and get away with it.
When you look at it there stealing from us, they have already used our taxes to bail the banks now there being greedy and using the money for their luxuries. I think that everyone should not vote at all as it is a waste of time, all the parties say vote us were not like that but there all the same GREED is all there about they don’t think about the real people us voters, they only care about us when its voting time once they have your vote they couldn’t care less about us.
All the parties have done a crime and yet no one is paying for their crimes, its like famous people when they do a crime they just get away with. What is the world coming to, we the public should not be paying for their mistakes, why should we. 
Please sign this so they don’t get away with it again. We have a right to be angry it is disgusting what they are doing.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
